external_references.description: Novetta. (n.d.). Operation SMN: Axiom Threat Actor Group Report. Retrieved November 12, 2014.

objects.description: The [Axiom](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0001) group has used other forms of obfuscation, include commingling legitimate traffic with communications traffic so that network streams appear legitimate. Some malware that has been used by [Axiom](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0001) also uses steganography to hide communication in PNG image files.
